**Kotri Junction railway station** ([Urdu](/wiki/Urdu_language "Urdu
language"): **کوٹری جوڑ ریلوے اسٹیشن** ‬‎, [Sindhi](/wiki/Sindhi_language
"Sindhi language"): **کوٹری جنکشن ریلوے اسٹیشن****‎**) is located in
[Kotri](/wiki/Kotri "Kotri") city, [Jamshoro district](/wiki/Jamshoro_District
"Jamshoro District") of [Sindh](/wiki/Sindh "Sindh") province,
[Pakistan](/wiki/Pakistan "Pakistan").

##
History[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Kotri_Junction_railway_station&action=edit&section=1
"Edit section: History")]

Kotri Junction station is among the oldest railway stations in Pakistan. It
served as the northern terminus point of the [Scinde
Railway](/wiki/Scinde_Railway "Scinde Railway"), which was established in
March 1855. A railway line was to be constructed between
[Karachi](/wiki/Karachi "Karachi") and [Kotri](/wiki/Kotri "Kotri") and work
on the Karachi terminus commenced in April 1858. By 13 May 1861, the station
opened to the public. This was the first railway line for public traffic
between Karachi and Kotri, a distance of 108 miles (174 km).[2][3][4]

"Edit section: Services")]

The following trains stop at Kotri Junction station:

[Braudabad](/wiki/Braudabad_railway_station "Braudabad railway station") _toward[Karachi City](/wiki/Karachi_City_railway_station "Karachi City railway station")_ |  | [Bolan Mail](/wiki/Bolan_Mail "Bolan Mail") |  |  [Sind University](/wiki/Sind_University_railway_station "Sind University railway station") _toward[Quetta](/wiki/Quetta_railway_station "Quetta railway station")_  
[Landhi Junction](/wiki/Landhi_Junction_railway_station "Landhi Junction railway station") _toward[Karachi Cantonment](/wiki/Karachi_Cantonment_railway_station "Karachi Cantonment railway station")_ |  | [Khyber Mail](/wiki/Khyber_Mail_\(Train\) "Khyber Mail \(Train\)") |  |  [Hyderabad Junction](/wiki/Hyderabad_Junction_railway_station "Hyderabad Junction railway station") _toward[Peshawar Cantonment](/wiki/Peshawar_Cantonment_railway_station "Peshawar Cantonment railway station")_
